%!TEX TS-program = xelatex
%!TEX encoding = UTF-8 Unicode
% Awesome CV LaTeX Template

% Compile: xelatex resume.tex
%
% This template has been downloaded from:

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%     Configuration
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%% Themes: Awesome-CV
\documentclass[11pt, a4paper]{awesome-cv}

%%% Override a directory location for fonts(default: 'fonts/')
\fontdir[fonts/]

%%% Configure a directory location for sections
\newcommand*{\sectiondir}{resume/}

%%% Override color
% Awesome Colors: awesome-emerald, awesome-skyblue, awesome-red, awesome-pink, awesome-orange
%                 awesome-nephritis, awesome-concrete, awesome-darknight
%% Color for highlight
% Define your custom color if you don't like awesome colors
\colorlet{awesome}{awesome-red}
%\definecolor{awesome}{HTML}{CA63A8}
%% Colors for text
%\definecolor{darktext}{HTML}{414141}
%\definecolor{text}{HTML}{414141}
%\definecolor{graytext}{HTML}{414141}
%\definecolor{lighttext}{HTML}{414141}

%%% Override a separator for social informations in header(default: ' | ')
%\headersocialsep[\quad\textbar\quad]


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%     3rd party packages
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%% Needed to divide into several files
\usepackage{import}


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%     custome commands
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\usepackage{stackengine}[2013-10-15]
\newcommand\textss[1]{\stackengine{.9ex}{}{\scriptsize#1}{O}{l}{F}{F}{L}}


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%     Personal Data
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%% Essentials
\name{Xiao}{Ling}

\mobile{available upon request}
%%% Social
\email{lingxiao@seas.upenn.edu}
\homepage{lingxiaoling.me}
\github{lingxiao}
\linkedin{xiaolingxiao}
%%% Optionals
\position{Software Engineer{\enskip\cdotp\enskip}Machine Learning Scientist{\enskip\cdotp\enskip}Painter}
% \quote{``Make the change that you want to see in the world."}


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%     Content
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%% Make a footer for CV with three arguments(<left>, <center>, <right>)
\makecvfooter
  {\today}
  % {Xiao Ling~~~·~~~Résumé}
  {Xiao Ling~~~·~~~Curriculum Vit\ae{}}
  % Vitae}
  {\thepage}

\begin{document}
%%% Make a header for CV with personal data
\makecvheader

%%% Import contents
\import{\sectiondir}{education.tex}
\import{\sectiondir}{experience.tex}
\import{\sectiondir}{publications.tex}
\import{\sectiondir}{presentation.tex}
\import{\sectiondir}{hackathons.tex}
\import{\sectiondir}{pl-languages.tex}

%%% The following sections are unused templates
% \import{\sectiondir}{honors.tex}
% \import{\sectiondir}{writing.tex}
% \import{\sectiondir}{committees.tex}
\end{document}
